dn13:15.1: te vata, vāseṭṭha → teva vāseṭṭha (mr), etthantare pāṭho sya-all potthakesu
dn13:30.5: pariyonaddhā → te (sya-all, mr) | onaddhā → ophuṭā (bj, mr); ophutā (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn13:36.2: āsīditvā → ādisitvā (mr) | visāraṃ → visādaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); visattaṃ (sya-all) | sukkhataraṃ → sukkhataraṇaṃ (bj, mr); sukhataraṃ (sya-all)
